rooms.name: A long tunnel
rooms.description:
You encounter some rapids as you enter this tunnel cut out of
the mountains by the river.

rooms.name: A long tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel branches off north.

rooms.name: A long tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel branches off south.

rooms.name: A long tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel branches off to the south.

rooms.name: An underground lake
rooms.description:
You are floating on a jet-black underground lake fed by dripping
water and lime from above. The tunnel continues to the east and the river
leads back west. To the north is a roughly-hewn hallway. There is also
a tunnel south.

rooms.name: A long narrow tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel rises sharply to the east.

rooms.name: A wide tunnel
rooms.description:
The tunnel continues east and west. To the east the tunnel dives
down into a bright light.

rooms.name: Cave-in
rooms.description:
You stand at the edge of a large pile of rubble created from the last
rockslide.

down.description: You can easily slide down the rocks without getting hurt.

rooms.name: At the foot of the rubble
rooms.description:
You are at the bottom of a large pile of rubble. A tunnel branches
off to the north and east.

rooms.name: Cave entrance
rooms.description:
You stand in the middle of a large and beautiful cave. A path leads
deeper into the darkness.

down.description: You look down into the cave. Bones are strewn about everywhere.

rooms.name: Giant cave
rooms.description:
This cavern overwhelms you. The walls and ceiling seem miles away.
Bones of previous adventurers lie strewn on the cavern floor.

rooms.name: Narrow bend
rooms.description: The tunnel turns to the south and west.

rooms.name: Large cave
rooms.description: You are standing in a large cave. Many furs are spread out on the floor.

rooms.name: Damp hallway
rooms.description: The walls here are extremely damp, as well as the floor.

rooms.name: Underground pool
rooms.description: You are wading in a knee deep pool of lime-water.

rooms.name: Damp hallway
rooms.description:
The walls of the tunnel are extremely damp here. You hear the faint
sound of running water to the south.

rooms.name: Narrow crawlway
rooms.description:
This crawlway is just big enough for a human to crawl through or a
halfling to walk through.

south.description: You smell the fragrant odor of fungus.

rooms.name: Large cavern
rooms.description:
You have entered a very large cavern. The rock formations would amaze
almost any dwarf.

rooms.name: Fungus patch
rooms.description:
As you walk through the fungus patch, you are shot at by many millions of
spores. You can hardly breathe.

east.description: The fragrant smell of fungus spores continues to the east

rooms.name: Fungus path
rooms.description:
As you walk along the path, millions of spores are shot at you. You can
hardly breathe.

south.description: A giant mushroom temple stands to the south.

west.description: The fragrant smell of spores continues to the west.

rooms.name: Fungus temple
rooms.description:
You find yourself standing inside of a giant mushroom. The inside
is decorated in the fashion of a temple.

rooms.name: Sloping passage
rooms.description: You follow a path sloping down from the fungus temple.

rooms.name: Sloping passage
rooms.description: You are on a path that gently slopes up from the underground pool.

north.description: You hear sounds of trickling water.

rooms.name: The Sands of Sorrow
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: The Sands of Sorrow
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

north.description: You see a nomad camp by an oasis.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: The Sands of Sorrow
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: The Sands of Sorrow
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: You see a river flowing into the mountain.

rooms.name: The Sands of Sorrow
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: The Sands of Sorrow
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: The sand is glowing in this direction.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: The Sands of Sorrow
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: The Sands of Sorrow
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: The Sands of Sorrow
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around you.
You feel lost.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

east.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: A nomad camp
rooms.description:
This small group of desert nomads has stopped for the day to rest
and refresh themselves beside this beautiful oasis. Three tents and some
camels make up the party. From within two of the tents you hear muffled
voices, obviously surprised at your visit.

east.description: You see inside one of the tents a huddled mass of people, probably slaves.

south.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: Inside a small tent
rooms.description:
This is a small and simple tent with few possessions in sight. Lying
here and there are young-looking men and women, possibly slaves to the
leader of this band.

east.description: Waving in the heat over the sand you see a HUGE pyramid.

west.description: You see the center of the nomad camp.

rooms.name: Beside the camels
rooms.description:
Here stand about ten camels, all hitched to some stakes plugged into
the ground. To the east you see a small tent while to the north you see a
larger, fancier tent.

north.description:
This tent seems to be the temporary abode of the nomad leader. You make a
mental note to visit it before you leave.

east.description: In this tent there are very large men, all carrying weapons.

south.description: You see the center of the nomad camp.

rooms.name: The warrior's tent.
rooms.description:
This tent has a few furnishings, but mainly it holds the band's
protectors. They all stare at you coldly as you enter.

west.description: Outside you see some peaceful camels.

rooms.name: The main tent
rooms.description:
This tent is as lavishly decorated on the inside as it is on the
outside. A fancy carpet lies on the sand and numerous baskets line the
walls.

rooms.name: The main tent
rooms.description:
This is where the leader of this band of nomads resides. He is
definitely rich as you inspect the tapestries, baskets, and a few
paintings as well.

west.description: You see the entrance to this tent.

rooms.name: Strange Glowing Sand
rooms.description:
A vast desert stretches for miles, the sand constantly shifting around
you.  But this patch of desert looks different...the sand glows.  You see a
futuristic city to the south.

west.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: The wind-swept ledge
rooms.description:
Being very careful not to lose your balance, you look around and
find that this canyon is about a half a kilometer deep. To the west is
a dark cave leading under the desert sands.

north.description: Sand as far as the eye can see.

rooms.name: The cave mouth
rooms.description:
The air in here is MUCH cooler than outside. From the west you hear
strange sounds, but can see nothing. The cave slopes down into the
darkness.

east.description: Outside is lighter and very windy.

rooms.name: The mysterious lair.
rooms.description:
You have stumbled upon the home of something. From the treasure
haphazardly strewn about and the rotting carcasses, you would guess that
this is a dragon's lair. As to what type, you can't really say. The cave
narrows out into a tunnel to the west.

rooms.name: A wide tunnel
rooms.description:
This tunnel seems to go on forever into the darkness. You carefully
feel your way along the walls.

rooms.name: A narrower tunnel
rooms.description:
The tunnel becomes very narrow and you fight to squeeze your way through.
The floor seems to level off a little.

rooms.name: A narrow crack
rooms.description:
This part of the tunnel is the hardest to move through as the walls
move in to meet you.

rooms.name: A small cavern.
rooms.description:
It is dark and damp and bats hang from the ceiling. A narrow crack is
in the east wall. The floor now slopes upwards.

rooms.name: A small shaft
rooms.description:
From within this shaft you can see a narrow hole in the roof just
large enough for one person. Back south is the cavern.

mobiles.name: The dervish
mobiles.description: The raggity dervish walks on aimlessly.

mobiles.name: The dervish
mobiles.description: The large dervish watches for signs of trouble.

mobiles.name: The coral snake
mobiles.description: A brightly colored snake slithers along the sands.

mobiles.name: The small scorpion
mobiles.description: A small, red scorpion scuttles away at your approach.

mobiles.name: The giant, purple sand worm
mobiles.description: A giant, purple sand worm thrusts up out of the sand and attacks!

mobiles.name: the brass dragon
mobiles.description:
The brass dragon steps out of the darkness and says 'Hello'.
Then adds to it, 'Prepare to die, have a nice day!'

mobiles.name: The nomad leader
mobiles.description: The nomad leader sits silently in prayer.

mobiles.name: The nomad commander
mobiles.description: The nomad commander stands here staring suspiciously at you.

mobiles.name: The nomad warrior
mobiles.description: A proud nomad warrior stands here.

mobiles.name: The slave
mobiles.description: A young slave sits here staring at you with pleading eyes.

mobiles.name: The dracolich
mobiles.description: A pile of bones rises up to form a skeletal dracolich.

mobiles.name: The drider
mobiles.description: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.

mobiles.name: The dark dwarf
mobiles.description: A duergar is here mining precious stones with his pick.

mobiles.name: The myconoid shaman
mobiles.description: A rather large myconoid stands here chanting in a strange tongue.

mobiles.name: The dustdigger
mobiles.description: A small oasis invites you to dive in.

mobiles.name: The rabid camel
mobiles.description: A very dangerous rabid camel snorts at you.

objects.name: a small mining pick
objects.description: A small mining pick made of what appears to be silver lies on the ground.

objects.name: a glowing suit of banded mail
objects.description: A glowing suit of banded mail lies on the ground.

objects.name: the halberd
objects.description: A mighty halberd lies against the wall.

objects.name: the amulet
objects.description: A mushroom shaped amulet lies on the ground.

objects.name: a large leg bone
objects.description: A large leg bone rests on the ground.

objects.name: a small cactus cup
objects.description: A small cactus cup lies on the ground.

objects.name: a small wicker basket
objects.description: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

objects.name: a small wicker basket
objects.description: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

objects.name: a small wicker basket
objects.description: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

objects.name: a small wicker basket
objects.description: A small wicker basket sits on the ground.

objects.name: a coil of rope
objects.description: A long coil of rope lies on the ground.

objects.name: a bunch of stakes
objects.description: A small bundle of stakes lies here.

objects.name: an old, tattered map
objects.description: An old, tattered, and much faded map lies here.

objects.name: a thick padded turban
objects.description: A thick padded turban lies here.

objects.name: a great pile of treasure
objects.description: A great, gleaming pile of treasure lies at your feet.

objects.name: a long, curved sabre
objects.description: A long, curved sabre stands upright in the ground.

objects.name: a curved scimitar
objects.description: A curved scimitar lies at your feet.

objects.name: a long, pointed cutlass
objects.description: A long, pointed cutlass lies here.

objects.name: a pink potion
objects.description: A pink potion stands here.

objects.name: a platinum wand
objects.description: A platinum wand lies here.

objects.name: a strange energy bow
objects.description: A strange energy bow lies here.

objects.name: an encrypted scroll
objects.description: An encrypted scroll lies at your feet.

objects.name: an iron bound chest
objects.description: An iron bound chest with a shiny lock sits here.

objects.name: a golden key
objects.description: A shiny golden key lies here.

objects.name: a copper bracelet
objects.description: A tarnished copper bracelet lies at your feet.

objects.name: a large ruby
objects.description: A large ruby lies on the ground collecting dust.

objects.name: a glittering diamond
objects.description: A glittering diamond lies at your feet.

objects.name: a brilliant sapphire
objects.description: A brilliant sapphire lies here twinkling.

objects.name: a deep blue lapis lazuli
objects.description: A deep blue lapis lazuli gem lies here.

objects.name: the tiger jewel
objects.description: The Tiger Jewel lies here blazing.

objects.name: the red-eyed jewel
objects.description: The red-eyed jewel glares at you greedily.

objects.name: a fiery green emerald
objects.description: A fiery green emerald sits here.
